message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, while I appreciate your interest, $950,000 is significantly lower than what I'm willing to accept.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This would still be a good deal for you, considering the value you place on the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about $1,025,000?
